teaser: The report will show the status of all its districts.
title: The Fed releases a new status report today
description: The report will show the status of all its districts.
contentencoded:
The Federal Reserve published a status report from the twelve regions that make up America's central banking system on Wednesday. Mark Vitner, senior economist with Wells Fargo, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to give a preview. 

Click on the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 4, 2013
